ðŸ“– Summary: Squish is a browser-based image compression tool that allows users to compress images in various formats (AVIF, JPEG, JPEG XL, PNG, and WebP) without server uploads. It supports batch processing, format conversion, and quality adjustment, leveraging WebAssembly for high-performance image optimization.
